bug.author: patsib
bug.description:
Typo in SensorShapeValidatorTests.cs (and maybe others) feedback to console: "Sensor sizes much match" > "Sensor sizes must match" SensorShapeValidatorTests.cs Lines 115, 121, 143, ..... Environment (please complete the following information):
ML-Agents version: Release 1 / April 30, 2020

comments.comment: Sorry, can't downgrade the label from Bug to anything less dramatic. Complete File reference is ml-agents/com.unity.ml-agents/Tests/Editor/Sensor/SensorShapeValidatorTests.cs
Thanks @sangue18 for catching this. I've got a fix in <denchmark-link:https://github.com/Unity-Technologies/ml-agents/pull/3987>#3987</denchmark-link>
